channel.title: Radio on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Radio on Dash

item.title: rtl-sdr steps
item.description: Installing and configurating steps: $ git clone https://github.com/balint256/gr-baz $ sudo apt-get install libboost-all-dev gr-osmosdr gnuradio-dev liblog4cpp5-dev $ cd gr-baz $ mkdir build $ cd build $ cmake .. $ make && sudo make install Install rtl-sdr: $ git clone git://git.osmocom.org/rtl-sdr.git $ cd rtl-sdr $ mkdir build $ cd build/ $ cmake ../ -DINSTALL_UDEV_RULES=ON $ sudo make install $ sudo ldconfig Now you could use sudo rtl_eeprom for probing the rtl equipments.
